attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that it about time that Aly Bain Scottish music maker was rewarded with at least a KB or possibly a Knight of the Thistle for his contribution to Scottish and World Music and his contribution to the education of the people.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for hhonours from the general public www.honours.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
